disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 15 November to end of Wednesday 17 November GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Cooler than of late. Mainly dry with sunny spells but outbreaks of drizzle possible and a moderate breeze.<br/><br/>Back-trajectories show air arriving having travelled from the Atlantic therefore very little import is expected from this path. <br/><br/>Overall, air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Wednesday 17 November to end of Wednesday 17 November GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: A bright sunny day on Wednesday after a cloudy start.<br/><br/>With a 'clean' Atlantic airflow and a westerly breeze ensuring good dispersion, air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
